title: Jason Schreier Speaks, Yakuza's Turn-Based Now - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.07.21
description:
Bloomberg's Jason Schreier comes by to talk about his book 'Press Reset,' Yakuza permanently going turn-based, and more!

Get Jason's book: http://www.kindafunny.com/jason
